alert.note: Alert for Northern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 2:07PM MDT until April 13 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches, with isolated amounts approaching 10 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
